casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Omar Demetrious PEARSON. No. 40P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. Omar D. Pearson, Pro Se. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 28th day of January 2008 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Forsyth County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in Conference this the 6th day of March 2008."
